description: After a long and harsh struggle with Onslaught's army, Tony Stark, Steve Rogers and Player find themselfs in a pinch. Will they push forwards to the capital or fall back to regroup? For now, only time can tell.

parts.speaker: brian
parts.text:
Don't you remember me?! It's me Brian, Joe!
We've known eachother for ages!

parts.speaker: brian
parts.text:
Eventhough you know my name, I do not know you.
In fact, I don't remember anything before coming here.

parts.speaker: brian
parts.text:
How can you not remember me?!
We've been through so much together.
This feels like a bad dream, a cruel nightmare.

parts.speaker: brian
parts.text:
Either you are a phantom, a mind trick, or just a hallucination.
Because I...I...

parts.speaker: brian
parts.text: I was there when you died.

parts.speaker: brian
parts.text: Heh, then it's weird that I feel just fine.
